entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
